review: I have been seeing Dr Mohan Raut for d past 3 yrs now and from day 1 i had faith in d way he spoke, diagnosed n treated me. I m glad for the treatment and consulting he provided in person, over msgs or phone calls. I delivered twin bful boys at his hospital and not once did i have any doubts about the way d delivery will happen or whether i will be fine or d babies will be okay. He is indeed an excellent doctor n a very gentle n humble soul esp due to his approachable n kind nature. Thank you doctor and your staff for all d help and love u gave me n our family throughout d years.

Visited for recurrent pregnancy loss. The doctor has explained the further course of action in detail. He has cleared all the doubts and made us comfortable. The hospital is very neat and hygienic. Blood collection rooms were also very neat. Reception staff and nurses were energetic and friendly.  Have obtained the confidence to be successful in the future in getting our own baby.
